name: cisco-webex-demo
description: A web application that demonstrates Cisco Webex calling capabilities using the Webex SDK. This app allows users to authenticate with Webex and make voice/video calls directly from the browser.

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', {recursive:true}); console.log('Cleaned dist folder')"
